column2: Please select at least one import type
Add the URL of the Google spreadsheet containing the new product data into the input field. The import mechanism will only take the data in the document into account.
Access denied to the provided spreadsheet. Please grant access by link to the provided spreadsheet.
Select the importer types you want to execute. Each importer type refers to another tab in the spreadsheet. The following types are available: %import_types%.
